title: The Underground: The Young Trib Force Fights Back
description: The Young Trib Force unleashes the power of the printed page through an underground newspaper at Nicolae High.School authorities are enraged after only a few copies of the first edition are distributed. After Judd devises a plan to distribute a copy of it to every student in the school, the authorities search with a vengeance for the kids responsible.Follow Judd, Vicki, Lionel, and Ryan as they and trusted friends face one close call after another until one of them is caught.
author: Jerry B. Jenkins
